amendment.description: To ensure that the Commission appropriately addresses impacts on small businesses of the revised civil penalties provisions.

action.text: Amendment SA 4143, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4143 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4143 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S1693-1696; text: CR S1696) To ensure that the Commission appropriately addresses impacts on small businesses of the revised civil penalties provisions.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4143 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Snowe.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4143 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
